title: de Biologisch-Dynamische Bakkerij
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, European, Non-veg
description:
Serves meat, veg options available. Bakery cafe offers vegan-friendly lunchtime food, coffee, wholemeal savory. Also sells a variety of organic breads, pastries, groceries, and drinks. Laid back atmosphere.
Confirmed open by happycow, Oct 2011.
